parameters.name: AlertId
parameters.description: The ID of the alert rule. You can call the ListPrometheusAlertRules operation to query the ID of the alert rule.

parameters.name: AlertName
parameters.description: The name of the alert rule.

parameters.name: Annotations
parameters.description: The annotations that are described in a JSON string. You must specify the name and value of each annotation.

parameters.name: DispatchRuleId
parameters.description: The ID of the notification policy. This parameter is required if the NotifyType parameter is set to `DISPATCH_RULE`.

parameters.name: Duration
parameters.description: The duration. The value ranges from 1 to 1440 minutes.

parameters.name: Expression
parameters.description: The expression of the alert rule. The expression must follow the PromQL syntax.

parameters.name: Labels
parameters.description: The tags that are described in a JSON string. You must specify the name and value of each tag.

parameters.name: Message
parameters.description: The alert message. Tags can be referenced in the {{$labels.xxx}} format.

parameters.name: NotifyType
parameters.description:
The method that is used to send alert notifications. Valid values:

- `ALERT_MANAGER`: Alert notifications are sent by Operation Center. This is the default value.
- `DISPATCH_RULE`: Alert notifications are sent based on the specified notification policy.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The type of the alert rule.
